line.text: %PLAYER%: Professor Xavier, we're at a door that looks as if it'll take us into Genosha but it won't open.
line.textb: %PLAYER%: Xavier, we at a door that leads into Genosha - but we can't get it open.

line.text: %ProfX%: That door requires a security code. You can obtain the code by accessing the computer of a downed Genoshan aircraft in the Dead Zone.
line.textb: %ProfX%: You'll need a security code to open that door. It can be obtained in the Dead Zone from the computer of a downed Genoshan aircraft.
